Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Flint fragment
Description: Flint fragment of remarkable craftsmanship, demonstrating the great dexterity of the artisans who fashioned them. This point has been damaged a little at the upper section, more sharply however at the lower section, at the level at which it was fastened to the pole (if it was used as a spear head). The point has scaled edges.
